Tartarus

You're Welcome, Ted

10 Mar 2020

Imagine trying to write a blog post needling one of your friends, but then misspelling misstepped and not resizing any of your images so they all overflow their containers. It’s truly remarkable I managed to lose a bet to someone like that…

Anyway, you’re welcome, and don’t worry, I’ll be dining on your dollar in return soon enough.
